overview: Paul Taylor is the Chief Executive Officer at Webmarketing 123, a leading Internet Marketing firm in the US. Webmarketing123 specializes in SEO, PPC, Social Media Marketing and Enterprise Search Marketing. Paul has a work experience of almost 20 years in the field of marketing and strategic consulting. He plays a primary role in formalizing Webmarketing123’s strategies and managing the company’s operations. Prior to founding Webmarketing123, he was the Vice President and General Manager at AT&T Wireless and a Management Consultant with Bain and Company. Paul believes in focusing on the quality and quantity of prospects visiting a company’s website to help them improve their marketing ROI. Paul Taylor holds a Bachelors and Masters degree in Business Administration from the Haas School of Business at the University of California at Berkeley.
